Article Title: Shark Tank Judge Anupam Mittal on India semi-final win: Chalo 'yeh bhi' bhi hisaab barabar
Article Text:
Here's what Anupam Mittal wrote on X

How other brands celebrated India's win

India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. After losing the toss against England, India scored 171/7 in 20 overs at the Guyana National Stadium. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.Like other matches, India's victory over England is being celebrated across the country.Shark Tank judge Anupam Mittal shared his joy over India's win via a post on microblogging platform - X, formerly Twitter.In his post, Mittal wrote "1947 me India se nikala aur 2024 me West Indies se,". Adding further, he said "Chalo üá¨üáß2022 ka bhi hisaab barabar üáÆüá≥üèÜ," pointing at 2022 India's loss against England in the 2022 T20 World Cup semi-final ."don't know about english tea, but english tears are delicious üòÇ #INDvENG," food delivery app Zomato wrote in a X post."Just packing ; Revenge order for Semi-Final in 2022 üò§," Walmart-owned Flipkart wrote. ‚ÄúHitman has once again added hope to the cart üôè," the e-commerce company wrote in another post on X.Quick commerce app Blinkit shared an image of billboard that read "Dear England, if you are thirsty, we can deliver a bo'ah of wo'ah in 10 minutes."
Article Summary: India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.

Article Title: Swiggy and Zomato celebrate India's semi-final victory over England: Iss baar trophy ...
Article Text:
Zomato

Swiggy

Cricket fever reached a new high in India as the Men in Blue secured a 68-run victory over arch-rivals England in the semi-final of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 .India's strong batting performance, with contributions from various players, laid the foundation for victory. Axar Patel emerged as the hero of the match with his all-round performance. England eventually fell short, managing only 103 runs in their allotted overs.Like all the previous World Cup matches, some of the biggest consumer-facing technology brands in India celebrated India's win.These brands have been regularly posting on their social accounts about India's matches. Here's how Zomato and Swiggy celebrated India‚Äôs win in the semi-finals.Zomato shared a series of tweets to celebrate India‚Äô win. In one such post the food delivery platform mentioned that English tears are more delicious as compared to English tea.Team India wants fans to go to bed on timeEngland took our KohinoorAnother finaliss baar trophy deliver hoke rahegiWhat happened this timeHaar se paet bhar gayabaapu is serving 1947 vibesFollowing their convincing win over England, Team India will now lock horns with South Africa in the highly anticipated final of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024. The T20 World Cup final will begin at 8PM on June 29, 2024.
Article Summary: India beat England by 68 runs in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 semi-final. Axar Patel emerged as the hero of the match with his all-round performance. Zomato shared a series of tweets to celebrate India‚Äôs win. The food delivery platform mentioned that English tears are more delicious as compared to English tea.

Article Title: Amazon is bringing Microsoft Xbox games to these Fire TV Stick models: How to play and more
Article Text:
What is cloud gaming and what's in it for gamers

How you can play Xbox games on Fire TV Stick

To play games on these Fire TV Stick models, users must download the Xbox app

Install and open the app, and sign in with your Microsoft account

If you're already an Xbox Game Pass Ultimate member, you'll have instant access to stream and play any of the hundreds of cloud-enabled titles in the Game Pass Ultimate library.

Then, connect a compatible Bluetooth controller and start gaming.

Amazon has partnered with Microsoft ‚Äôs gaming division, Xbox, to bring games like Starfield, Fallout 4 and Forza Horizon 5 on Fire TV Stick models. Starting next month, Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers will be able to play several cloud-enabled games directly through the Xbox app on select Fire TV devices ‚Äì no console required.According to Amazon, this integration will bring the vast Xbox Game Pass Ultimate game library to TVs with a compatible Fire TV Stick and Bluetooth-enabled controller.Cloud gaming is the ability to play games without needing a console. All users need a good internet connection and a controller. This means users can move cloud gaming setup from the living room TV to a different room.‚ÄúAs long as you have a solid internet connection and your compatible Fire TV Stick, and a compatible controller, you can take your Xbox Game Pass games and saved progress travels with you,‚Äù Amazon added. The Fire TV Stick can stream and run graphically intense Xbox games like Senua's Saga: Hellblade II, the company said.In July, Amazon will make the Xbox app available on Fire TV Stick 4K Max (2023) and a Fire TV Stick 4K (2023) via the Amazon Appstore.As per Amazon, the Xbox Wireless Controller, Xbox Adaptive Controller, DualSense or DualShock 4 controllers will work with the stick!Those who are not a subscriber, can sign up for Xbox Game Pass Ultimate through the app ‚Äúfor one low monthly price‚Äù and start playing. For access to Fortnite , there's even the option to try for free.
Article Summary: Amazon has partnered with Microsoft ‚Äôs gaming division, Xbox, to bring games like Starfield, Fallout 4 and Forza Horizon 5 on Fire TV Stick models. Starting next month, Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers will be able to play several cloud-enabled games directly through the Xbox app on select Fire TV devices.

Article Title: How and why Indian IT companies like Infosys, Wipro are taking the ‚Äòacquisition route‚Äô to grow
Article Text:
Indian IT giants ramp up acquisitions for growth

Infosys acquired three companies in the past year:

Wipro invested in insurtech firm Aggne and SDVerse:

HCLTech focusing on strengthening its position in the telecom vertical:

Tech Mahindra completed

Indian IT companies like Infosys , Wipro , and HCLTech are turning to acquisitions to meet investment needs in new areas like Generative AI (GenAI), a report has said, adding that this is because the organic expansion opportunities are limited in a cautious global market.According to a report in The Economic Times, Phil Fersht, CEO and chief analyst of HFS Research said that the IT and BPO services markets are currently flat, and that ‚Äúmergers and acquisitions activity will increase over the next 12 months.‚Äù‚ÄúMost new acquisitions will be in areas that add incremental revenue, such as Cognizant adding Belcan to add aerospace and engineering, Wipro and Rizing to add SAP consulting depth, and Accenture and Udacity to add tech learning at scale,‚Äù added Fersht.They acquired Danske Bank's GCC unit Danske IT for $454 million, boosting their presence in the Middle East; invested $34 million in InSemi Technology Services; and $480 million in Germany's in-tech Holding GmbH to strengthen their research and development (ER&D) capabilities.Wipro acquired a majority stake in insurtech firm Aggne for $66 million and a minority stake (27%) in the automotive software marketplace SDVerse for $5.85 million.India's third-largest IT player, HCLTech, acquired two German companies ‚Äì a 100% stake in ASAP Group, an automotive engineering services provider, for $279 million, and a business division of Hewlett Packard Enterprise's Communications Technology Group for $225 million.In February,the acquisition of Orchid Cybertech Services (OCSI), a Philippines-based BPO firm, for $3.27 million.Meanwhile, US-based Cognizant this year acquired private equity-backed digital engineering firm Belcan for $1.29 billion (around Rs 10,700 crore). It also bought American software firm Service Now's partner Thirdera. Accenture, the largest global giant in the space, made $2.3 billion investments across 12 acquisitions in Q3FY24.
Article Summary: Indian IT companies like Infosys, Wipro and HCLTech are turning to acquisitions to meet investment needs. This is because organic expansion opportunities are limited in a cautious global market. Most new acquisitions will be in areas that add incremental revenue.

Article Title: AT&T CEO John Stankey wants Apple, Google, Microsoft and Facebook to pay for 'affordable internet'
Article Text:
What is USF

AT&T CEO John Stankey is calling on Congress to grant the FCC the authority to require major technology companies to financially support the Universal Service Fund (USF). This government program subsidizes access to phone and internet services for low-income Americans, schools, libraries, and rural healthcare providers.Currently, the USF relies on fees collected from cellphone and landline subscribers.Stankey argues at a Utah telecom forum that " Big Tech " firms, who have profited from the internet infrastructure built by telecom companies, should share the burden of ensuring everyone has access.This push for Big Tech contributions comes after a separate government program providing broadband subsidies to 23 million households recently ran out of funds. The White House request for additional funding was denied by Congress.The USF is a critical resource for bridging the digital divide, a term referring to the gap between those who have access to technology and those who don't. Meta, Facebook's parent company, and Google have not yet responded to Stankey's proposal.
Article Summary: AT&T CEO John Stankey is calling on Congress to grant the FCC the authority to require major technology companies to financially support the Universal Service Fund. This government program subsidizes access to phone and internet services for low-income Americans. Currently, the USF relies on fees collected from cellphone and landline subscribers.

Article Title: Amazon has this 'China plan' to take on its biggest online rivals
Article Text: Amazon is reportedly shaking things up with a new online store dedicated to ultra-low-cost apparel and home goods. According to a report in Bloomberg, this move marks their biggest effort yet to compete with discount giants like Temu and Shein.Leaked information from presentations to Chinese sellers reveals Amazon's plan to ship items directly from China, a significant shift from their usual focus on fast delivery through US warehouses.This new storefront will be a designated section on the Amazon website, initially accessible only to select sellers."We're constantly innovating to provide more options, lower prices, and a smoother experience for our customers," said Amazon spokesperson Maria Boschetti, acknowledging the program.Documents include an invitation to a July 5th launch event in Yiwu, China, a major manufacturing and export center. This highlights Amazon's focus on courting Chinese sellers to fuel this new venture.The rise of Temu, a subsidiary of PDD Holdings, and Shein has put pressure on established US retailers like Amazon. These competitors have captured customer attention with rock-bottom prices and aggressive marketing, particularly Temu's heavy presence on social media and TV.Earlier this year, Amazon lowered fees for merchants selling low-priced clothing, hinting at their strategy to match Shein's budget-friendly offerings. This new discount storefront is the next step in their fight for dominance in the affordable goods market.
Article Summary: Amazon is reportedly launching a new online store dedicated to ultra-low-cost apparel and home goods. This move marks their biggest effort yet to compete with discount giants like Temu and Shein. Leaked information from presentations to Chinese sellers reveals Amazon's plan to ship items directly from China.

Article Title: CEO of Bengaluru-based startup says ChatGPT-maker OpenAI‚Äôs Sam Altman is logged into Slack workspace: ‚ÄúSeeing him online‚Ä¶‚Äù
Article Text:
SuperKalam‚Äôs connection with OpenAI



The founder and CEO of a Bengaluru-based startup, SuperKalam, has revealed a surprising source of motivation: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 's online presence. SuperKalam utilises OpenAI's AI models to create personalised learning experiences for UPSC exam aspirants.‚ÄúWe have Sam Altman on our Slack workspace. Seeing him online itself makes me work harder all the time.Amazing story,‚Äù Vimal Singh Rathore , the CEO of SuperKalam, said in a post on X.Rathore said in the comments section that the company collaborated with OpenAI team during their early phase in 2023.‚ÄúWe collaborated with OpenAI team to help us with @SuperKalam_ during very early phase. Jan 23,‚Äù he said.He also said that since his team worked with the OpenAI team, the ChatGPT-maker was ‚Äúkind (enough) to give us that kind of access.‚Äù SuperKalam leverages OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 AI models.In a post shared on X in June last year, Rathore was among a group of a handful of people who met Altman during his trip to India. He was part of an event with developers at IIIT-Delhi.‚ÄúThrilled to meet @sama in person. Equally exciting is to be building in AI,‚Äù he wrote on X.A few weeks later, he shared a video of another event with Altman, this one taken during the Y Combinator alumni meet.According to Rathor‚Äôs LinkedIn profile, Vimal Singh Rathore, along with Aseem Gupta, founded SuperKalam in July 2023. The startup is backed by Y Combinator, Google for Startups, Good Water Capital, FundersClub, Titan Cap, AngelList, iSeed, Kunal Shah (CRED), Gaurav Munjal (Unacademy), Dan Reich, Sujeet (Udaan) and Tanmay Bhat.
Article Summary: Bengaluru-based startup, SuperKalam, utilises OpenAI's AI models to create personalised learning experiences for UPSC exam aspirants. CEO Vimal Singh Rathore: ‚ÄúWe have Sam Altman on our Slack workspace. Seeing him online itself makes me work harder all the time.‚Äù

Article Title: Wordle 1101 Puzzle for June 24, 2024: Hints, clues and solution for word of the day
Article Text:
Wordle 1101 Hints and Clues for June 24, 2024

Today‚Äôs word of the day starts with the alphabet D.

There is only one vowel in today‚Äôs word of the day.

Alphabet L is repeated in today‚Äôs word.

Alphabet g is also present in the word.

Today‚Äôs word of the day ends with the letter Y.

Wordle 1101, June 24, 2024: Word of the Day

Wordle, the popular word-guessing game that has taken the world by storm, continues to challenge players with its cryptic puzzles. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned Wordle aficionado or a newbie trying to crack the code, we‚Äôve got you covered. Let‚Äôs dive into today‚Äôs hints and uncover the elusive answer!Wordle is a daily word game created by Josh Wardle, a Brooklyn-based software engineer.Since its debut in 2021, the word game has gained popularity among users across the globe. Article Title: Realme C61 to launch in India on June 28: Here‚Äôs what the smartphone may offer
Article Text:
Realme C61 confirmed features

Realme C61 expected features

Realme C61 is set to make its debut in India on Jun 28. Walmart-owned Flipkart has created a microsite of the upcoming smartphone, teasing some of its features.Realme C61 is said to come with an integrated metallic frame. The upcoming phone will be TUV Rheinland certified and will feature ArmorShell protection.In the teased images, Realme C61 can be seen sporting a circular-shaped selfies camera cut out at the front.On the rear, the smartphone has a dual camera system.The phone is teased to come with IP54 dust and water resistance body.The smartphone has appeared on the FCC website. According to it, Realme C61 is said to come with a 5,000mAh battery capacity. Realme C61 may come with 45watt charging support. It may be equipped with Realme‚Äôs custom UI based on Android 14 operating system.The device is tipped to come powered by a UNISOC Speedtrum T612 processor paired with up to 4GB of RAM and up to 128GB internal storage capacity.As far as the pricing is concerned, Realme C61 is rumoured to be an affordable device. It may carry a price tag around Rs 10,000.
Article Summary: Realme C61 is set to make its debut in India on Jun 28. Walmart-owned Flipkart has created a microsite of the upcoming smartphone. The phone is teased to come with IP54 dust and water resistance body. It may be equipped with Realme‚Äôs custom UI based on Android 14 operating system.

Article Title: Tata Group, Infosys, Airtel and 7 other most valuable brands in India
Article Text:
Top 10 most valuable brands in India

Top 10 most valuable brands in India (Image Source: Brand Finance)

Telecom sector achieve 61% growth Read Also | Tata Group is India‚Äôs most valuable brand with a brand value of $28.6 billion. Infosys and HDFC Group follow it as the second and third most valuable brands in the country. Brand valuation consultancy firm Brand Finance released the latest ranking of most valuable Indian brands in a report titled ‚ÄòIndia 100 2024‚Äô.As per the report, Infosys saw a steady 9% growth in brand value to $14.2 billion at the present.HDFC Group which jumped to third spot as India‚Äôs most valuable brand has a total brand value of $10.4 billion, following the merger with HDFC Ltd.‚ÄúTata Group‚Äôs brand value highlights the first time an Indian brand is close to the $30 billion brand value mark,‚Äù the report says.Brand Finance report names top 100 most valuable brands in India. Among top 10 are Tata Group, Infosys, HDFC, LIC, Reliance Industries Limited, SBI, Airtel , HCL Tech, Larsen & Turbo and Mahindra.Wipro came in 11th, followed by Jio Group on 12th. Flipkart stood on 35th, Zetwerk secured the 64th position, while Havells came on 80th. The top 100 most valuable Indian brands list also included Croma and BSNL.As per Brand Finance report, telecom operators Jio, Airtel and Vodafone Idea have accelerated growth by adapting to evolving consumer device usage patterns. The telecom sector saw a growth of 61%.Owing to the structural reforms and regulatory improvements, the banking sector witnessed a rise in the brand values of leading public sector banks. State Bank of India (SBI) retains its position as the second most valuable bank in India with a total brand value of $6.9 billion. ICICI bank saw a 33% jump in brand value and has brand value of $4.5 billion. Indian Bank, InducInd Bank, Union Bank of India and Punjab National Bank are among the fastest-growing Indian banking brands.
Article Summary: Tata Group is India‚Äôs most valuable brand with a brand value of $28.6 billion. Infosys and HDFC Group follow it as the second and third most valuable brands in the country. The top 100 most valuable Indian brands list also included Croma and BSNL.

Article Title: Microsoft AI unit chief Mustafa Suleyman on the competition with ChatGPT-maker OpenAI: ‚ÄúIt is true that‚Ä¶‚Äù
Article Text:
undefined

What Microsoft‚Äôs Mustafa Suleyman said on Sam Altman and AI regulation



Read Also |

Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman has said that the company competes ‚Äòferociously‚Äô with ChatGPT-maker OpenAI , the company in which the Windows-maker invested upwards of $13 billion. Suleyman also said that he dearly loves Sam Altman and trusts him on AI safety.He noted that Microsoft‚Äôs AI plans are not so closely dependent on OpenAI.‚ÄúIt is true that we have ferocious competition with them,‚Äù Suleyman said about OpenAI in an interview with CNBC‚Äôs Andrew Ross Sorkin at the Aspen Ideas Festival.‚ÄúThey are an independent company. We don‚Äôt own or control them. We don‚Äôt even have any board members. So they do entirely their own thing. But we have a deep partnership. I‚Äôm very good friends with Sam, have huge respect and, trust and faith in what they‚Äôve done. And that‚Äôs how it‚Äôs going to roll for many, many years to come,‚Äù Suleyman said.You can watch the interview here (Cue 7:20):He noted that he wants to see both regulation and a slower pace for AI development.Talking about OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and AI regulation , Suleyman said: ‚ÄúMaybe it‚Äôs because I‚Äôm a Brit with European tendencies, but I don‚Äôt fear regulation in the way that sort of everyone seems to by default,‚Äù he said. Suleyman also described all of this fingerpointing by the former employees as a ‚Äúhealthy dialogue.‚Äù‚ÄúI think it‚Äôs a great thing that technologists and entrepreneurs and CEOs of companies like myself and Sam, who I love dearly and think is awesome are talking about regulation,‚Äù he said.‚ÄúHe is not cynical, he is sincere. He believes it genuinely,‚Äù Suleyman said about Altman.‚ÄúFriction is going to be our friend here. These technologies are becoming so powerful, they will be so intimate, they‚Äôll be so ever-present, that this is a moment where it‚Äôs fine to take stock,‚Äù he added.Suleyman also noted that if all of this dialogue slows down AI development by six to 18 months or longer ‚Äúit‚Äôs time well spent.‚Äù
Article Summary: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman has said that the company competes ‚Äòferociously‚Äô with ChatGPT-maker OpenAI. He also said that he dearly loves Sam Altman and trusts him on AI safety. He noted that he wants to see both regulation and a slower pace for AI development.

Article Title: Why laid-off Paytm employees have filed complaints with labour ministry
Article Text:
What laid-off employees have to say



Paytm founder Vijay Shekhar Sharma‚Äôs job cuts warning



Several Paytm employees who have been laid off have reportedly filed complaints with the ministry of labour and employment alleging that the fintech company has made "unlawful termination" without proper compensation. The complaints, filed between June 1 and June 12, seek reinstatement.Moneycontrol said that it accessed a copy of the filed complaint on the ministry's Samandhan portal and the same has been also verified by an official.The complaints claim that the Paytm management conducted unfair and unethical termination practices. Employees have also included supporting documents, including emails and official records with the complaints. While the report hasn‚Äôt revealed the exact number of complaints, some claim that it could be around 50.While some ex-employees said that they are waiting for a response from the ministry, a few others said that they were forced to resign.‚ÄúWe are awaiting a response from the Ministry and hope the case will be taken up by them. If not satisfactory, will take the court route,‚Äù said one of the employees, who claimed to have been terminated by Paytm without compensation or justification.Some employees have alleged being forced to "voluntarily resign".‚ÄúMy HRBP reached out to me yesterday (June 20) saying if I don‚Äôt resign by 12pm today (June 21), I will be terminated. I will take up the legal route as soon as possible. A few others are planning to do the same while some are already in the process,‚Äù another one said.In a letter to its shareholders last month, Paytm founder Vijay Shekhar Sharma acknowledged the company's first-ever sales decline. As per Sharma, the company is implementing cost-cutting measures targeting employee expenses, aiming to save Rs 400-500 crore annually."One97 Communications Limited (OCL) is providing outplacement support to employees which have resigned as a part of the restructuring efforts by the company,‚Äù the company previously said.‚ÄúAs we harness AI capabilities and enhance governance structures, we are fully committed towards building our business according to regulatory compliances,‚Äù the Paytm letter added.Sharma also noted that the company will move forward with a ‚Äúleaner organisation structure.‚Äù Apart from suggesting job cuts, Paytm also said that it will trim its non-core assets.
Article Summary: Several Paytm employees who have been laid off have reportedly filed complaints with the ministry of labour and employment. The complaints, filed between June 1 and June 12, seek reinstatement. Some ex-employees said that they are waiting for a response from the ministry.

Steps to use Indian Bike Driving 3D Cheat Codes

In the number entry interface, use your device's keypad to input one of the provided cheat codes. Each cheat code corresponds to a specific reward mentioned in the description.

Article Title: Melinda French Gates on divorce with Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates: It‚Äôs just painful‚Ä¶
Article Text:
Melinda stepped from Gates foundation after the divorce

Bill Gates divorced Melinda French Gates in 2021. Years later, Melinda French Gates has opened up about her divorce with the Microsoft co-founder. In an interview with Time Magazine recently, she described the end of 27-years marriage as ‚Äòa painful and horrible experience‚Äô.‚ÄúGetting a divorce is a horrible thing. It‚Äôs just painful. It‚Äôs awful when you realize you need one,‚Äù she said.Although later she corrected 'horrible' to 'hard', but added that things are wonderful now that it‚Äôs over.In the interview, Melinda French Gates also talked about how getting divorced in a pandemic helped the couple get privacy. ‚ÄúIt gave us the privacy to do what needed to be done in private," she told the publication.She also reflected on being able to navigate the process while taking care of children. ‚ÄúYou know, I separated first before I made the full decision about a divorce. And to be able to do that in private while I‚Äôm still trying to take care of the kids, while still making certain decisions about how you‚Äôre going to disentangle your life - thank God," she said.The divorce led her to step away from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation in May this year, three years after the divorce. During the interview, she told Time that she thought about the effect of divorce on the foundation."I thought a lot about my three children. But I certainly thought about the effect on the foundation. Those are the three biggest buckets: me, the kids, and the foundation. And I wanted to make sure that when we came through it to the other side - all of those pieces were intact.‚ÄùMelinda also explained that she does not see her decision to exit the foundation as ‚Äòdownsizing‚Äô. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt see it honestly as a downsizing ...I was just ready to be able to have full decision-making control about where all the funds go,‚Äù she said.
Article Summary: Melinda French Gates has opened up about her divorce with the Microsoft co- founder. In an interview with Time Magazine recently, she described the end of 27-years marriage as ‚Äòa painful and horrible experience‚Äô Melinda also talked about how getting divorced in a pandemic helped the couple get privacy.

Article Title: Save money on your OTT subscriptions with these best tips
Article Text:
Tips to slash your OTT subscription costs

Evaluate your subscriptions

How often do you use each service?

Are there overlapping content offerings?

Which services offer the most value for your viewing preferences?

Take advantage of free trials

Bundle subscriptions

Share subscriptions with family and friends

Look for discounts and promotions

Opt for ad-supported plans

Downgrade to a lower tier

Cancel unused subscriptions

Take advantage of yearly plans

Keep an eye on price increases

Rotate OTT subscriptions based on content releases

Use cashback and reward programs

Use public libraries

Monitor your viewing habits

In the age of streaming, Over-the-Top (OTT) platforms have completely transformed the way we consume entertainment. These platforms offer a vast array of content, from movies and TV shows to documentaries and live sports, making it possible to access virtually any type of entertainment on demand. The convenience and variety offered by OTT services have led to their widespread adoption, and many households now subscribe to multiple streaming platforms to cater to diverse viewing preferences.However, with the increasing number of available options, managing multiple subscriptions can become overwhelming and costly. Each platform typically requires a separate subscription fee, and these costs can quickly add up, putting a strain on your budget. Moreover, the abundance of content across various services means that it's easy to subscribe to more than you actually need or use, leading to unnecessary expenses.Fortunately, there are several strategies you can employ to save money on OTT subscriptions without sacrificing your viewing experience. By being strategic about your subscription choices and making the most of available offers and features, you can enjoy your favourite shows and movies while keeping costs under control.The first step towards saving on OTT subscriptions is to evaluate your current subscriptions. List all the streaming services you subscribe to and consider the following:By assessing your usage and preferences, you can identify subscriptions to cancel or downgrade. If you rarely watch content on a particular platform, consider cancelling it and redirecting those funds to a service you use more frequently.Many OTT platforms offer free trials for new users, ranging from a week to a month. Use these free trials to explore different services and their content libraries without committing financially. Set reminders to cancel the trial before it ends to avoid charges. You can also take turns using free trials from different platforms to enjoy their content without paying for multiple subscriptions simultaneously.Many streaming services provide bundled packages that combine multiple subscriptions at a reduced price. For instance, Disney+ offers a bundle that includes Hulu and ESPN+ for less than the cost of subscribing to each service separately. Search for bundles that match your viewing habits and preferences to save money.Many OTT platforms permit multiple profiles or simultaneous streaming on various devices. Utilise this feature by sharing subscriptions with family members or friends. Split the cost of a subscription among multiple users to reduce individual expenses. Check each platform's terms of service to ensure you are not violating any rules.Watch for discounts and promotions from OTT platforms, as many services provide special deals during holidays, anniversaries, or other significant events. Additionally, some platforms provide discounts for students, military personnel, and senior citizens. Sign up for newsletters or follow the platforms on social media to stay informed about upcoming promotions.Many streaming services provide ad-supported plans at a reduced cost compared to their ad-free versions. Although watching ads might be a slight inconvenience, it can lead to substantial savings. Evaluate whether ad-supported plans are a viable option for you, especially if the cost difference is substantial.If you don't need all the features offered by your current subscription tier, consider downgrading to a lower tier. If you're currently subscribed to a premium plan that includes 4K streaming but primarily watch content on a standard HD screen, transitioning to a standard plan could be a cost-saving option. Evaluate your viewing habits and requirements to decide if downgrading to a lower-tier plan would meet your needs effectively.Over time, it's common to collect multiple subscriptions, some of which may remain unused. Regularly assess your subscriptions and cancel those that are no longer in use. This straightforward action can redirect funds to more worthwhile purposes. Be vigilant about monitoring cancellation deadlines to prevent unnecessary charges for services you no longer require.Choosing a yearly plan instead of monthly subscriptions can lead to significant savings. Numerous OTT platforms offer discounts on annual subscriptions, equating to several months of service for free compared to monthly rates. Opting for a yearly plan is a prudent decision if you anticipate long-term use of a service, ensuring cost-effectiveness in the long run.Streaming services occasionally increase their subscription prices. Stay informed about upcoming price hikes and evaluate whether the service still offers good value at the new rate. If a price increase makes a subscription less affordable, consider switching to a different service or taking advantage of available promotions.The content offerings on OTT platforms are dynamic, regularly updating with new movies and shows while removing others. To optimise your savings, consider rotating your subscriptions according to the release schedules of your preferred content. Subscribe to a service for a period, enjoy the content you want, then cancel and switch to another platform. This method ensures you only pay for subscriptions when actively watching content that aligns with your current interests.Certain credit cards and cashback apps provide rewards for streaming service transactions, allowing you to earn cashback or points that can be used towards future subscriptions. Additionally, several OTT platforms have referral programs that offer incentives such as free months of service for referring new subscribers. These programs can help you maximise savings and get more value out of your streaming subscriptions.Several public libraries collaborate with streaming platforms like Kanopy and Hoopla to provide complimentary access to their services. Contact your local library to inquire about available OTT services, enabling you to enjoy a wide selection of movies and shows at no extra expense.Finally, paying attention to your viewing habits can assist you in making well-informed choices regarding your subscriptions. Monitor the time you spend on each platform and the types of content you enjoy the most. This data can help you select subscriptions that are not only cost-effective but also cater to your entertainment preferences effectively.
Article Summary: In the age of streaming, Over-the-Top (OTT) platforms have completely transformed the way we consume entertainment. Many households now subscribe to multiple streaming platforms to cater to diverse viewing preferences. By being strategic about your subscription choices, you can enjoy your favourite shows and movies while keeping costs under control.

Article Title: Apple Intelligence launch in China may face these three ‚Äòchallenges‚Äô
Article Text:
Tough rules for AI models

Ban on ChatGPT, which will be integrated in Apple devices

Privacy, a core focus for Apple

China has tough rules for AI models

Ban on OpenAI‚Äôs ChatGPT in China

Private Cloud Compute

Apple has announced Apple Intelligence , a suite of AI features that will run on iPhones, iPads and Mac PCs. The AI features will be available later this year to users globally, including China ‚Äì one the most critical markets for the company. However, the company‚Äôs big AI push may face some challenges in China as regulators have in place strict rules around the technology amid tough competition.The three challenges that the company may face in China are (via CNBC):China‚Äôs AI market is tightly regulated and all companies launching AI models must have approval from the regulators for the commercial use of LLMs.The country has also made it mandatory for Generative AI providers to take down ‚Äúillegal‚Äù content.Since some of the features of Apple Intelligence are developed by the company itself, Apple will likely need to get its AI model approved by authorities under Chinese rules.China has also banned OpenAI‚Äôs ChatGPT. Some of Apple‚Äôs voice assistant Siri‚Äôs capabilities are dependent on ChatGPT. This could mean that Apple may have to find a local AI company that provides the same level of capabilities as ChatGPT. Baidu and Alibaba are among China‚Äôs technology giants that have their own LLMs and voice assistants.Apple's AI launch highlighted a focus on user privacy. Their new system, Private Cloud Compute, processes user data on Apple-owned servers, with the company claiming the data itself is not stored.However, in China, Apple's iCloud data is stored on servers located locally and operated by a third party. This may raise concerns about whether Apple can maintain complete control over its AI computing servers in the country.This means that Apple must have a similar partnership for its AI servers in the region to keep user data private.
Article Summary: Apple has announced Apple Intelligence, a suite of AI features that will run on iPhones, iPads and Mac PCs. The AI features will be available later this year to users globally, including China. However, the company‚Äôs big AI push may face some challenges in China as regulators have in place strict rules around the technology.

Article Title: TCS' 80,000 skills gap; world's largest 'AI-ready workforce' and more
Article Text:
"TCS has the world‚Äôs largest AI-ready workforce"

TCS sees headcount fall first time in 19 years

India's largest IT services company Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is facing a significant challenge filling a massive number of open positions. During a town hall earlier this month, the global operations head of TCS ' resource management group (RMG) Amar Shetye revealed that the company currently has thousands of open positions that it is not able to fill due to the skills gap.Shetye put the number at 80,000. For those unaware, the RMG team at TCS is responsible for allocation of available resources to various projects across the company and in case of any shortfall, fill such requirements through contractors. These contractors are on the roles of the hiring agencies and may or may not be hired as permanent staff by the company.Skills gap, here means, a mismatch between the skills possessed by employees and those their roles demand.An employee who attended the townhall anonymously told TOI, "We were told that either skillsets or employee aspirations are not matching project requirements. However, at TCS, no associate is forced to take on a project if they are not comfortable with it.""He told us that we should consider ourselves fortunate that the firm is not laying off employees for not being mapped to any project unlike other firms," another employee on the bench added.The company‚Äôs recent annual report revealed that 33% of job requirements are currently being met by grooming existing talent.Post the announcement of fourth quarter results, TCS CEO K Krithivasan said that the company has built one of the largest artificial-intelligence-ready workforces in the world. "TCS is currently working over 200 engagements in GenAI with our clients and foresees a promising pipeline of future work across all industries," he wrote.TCS posted strong performance in the fourth quarter of the fiscal year 2024-25. "This is a quarter of strong deals and execution for us. Continuous focus on operational excellence helped us achieve a 26% operating margin." The management also said that deal wins were "across markets, industries and geographies."The Mumbai-headquartered company said that it had signed new deals totalling $13.2 billion in the fourth quarter, which is one of the highest ever for the company even as it signalled a cautious turnaround for the industry. The company added that the pain may be bottoming out and FY25 will be better than FY24.TCS's Gen-AI deal pipeline is said to have touched $900 million. ‚ÄúOur Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) pipeline has surged to $900 million, marking a doubling in value. The Total Contract Value (TCV) of the deal comprises primarily standard-sized deals, with the exception of a significant win secured in Q3," the company said in its earnings report.TCS' full year headcount fell for the first time in 19 years. The company reported a quarter-on-quarter decline of 1,759 in its headcount for the fourth quarter of FY2024-25. TCS concluded the fourth quarter with a workforce totaling 601,546 employees, with women comprising 35.6% of the total.
Article Summary: India's largest IT services company Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is facing a significant challenge filling a massive number of open positions. During a town hall earlier this month, the global operations head of TCS'resource management group (RMG) Amar Shetye put the number at 80,000.

Article Title: HDFC Bank users, this 'UPI change' is coming starting June 25
Article Text:
Why HDFC Bank is making this change

What is UPI Lite and why banks are pushing it

How to register for email to receive all the UPI transaction alerts



https://instaservices.hdfcbank.com/?journey=107&source_type=103

Starting June 25, HDFC Bank will stop sending text alerts for low-value UPI transactions. This means that HDFC Bank customers will receive SMS alerts for UPI transactions exceeding Rs 100 when sending money and similar notification for when received is above Rs 500. However, the bank will continue to send email alerts for all transactions with no absolutely change.In a mail as well as SMS alert sent to its customers, HDFC Bank said: ‚ÄúStarting from 25th June, 2024: Email Alerts: Continue to receive email alerts for all UPI transactions.SMS Notifications: Now only for transactions above Rs 100 (money sent/paid) and Rs 500 (money received).‚ÄùThis change aligns with banking norms, which require text messages for transactions over Rs 5,000. Despite this, many banks send alerts for lower-value debits as well. HDFC Bank stated that feedback indicated alerts for low-value transactions were deemed 'not useful,' as there is often duplication of notifications from UPI payment apps.Bankers noted that bulk text messages cost between Rs 0.01-0.03 each. With UPI transactions averaging around 40 crores per day, banks collectively spend several crores daily on text message alerts.Banks are also promoting the use of UPI Lite for transactions up to Rs 500. UPI Lite allows a small amount of money to be set aside by the app, facilitating quick payments without the need for second-factor authentication.By reducing the frequency of low-value transaction alerts, HDFC Bank and others aim to streamline notifications for customers while also cutting costs. This shift is expected to enhance the user experience and encourage the adoption of UPI Lite for smaller transactions. However, users can register their email with HDFC bank to receive messages of all the UPI transactionsStep 1: Click onStep 2: Enter the registered mobile numberStep 3: Identify using DoB or PAN or Customer ID and click on "Get OTP."
Article Summary: HDFC Bank will stop sending text alerts for low-value UPI transactions. Bank will continue to send email alerts for all transactions with no absolutely change. This change aligns with banking norms, which require text messages for transactions over Rs 5,000.

iPhone 14 specifications and features

Powered by Apple's A15 Bionic SoC, this smartphone guarantees seamless performance and efficient multitasking capabilities.

Its camera system is versatile, featuring a 12-megapixel wide-angle lens, a secondary 12-megapixel sensor with an ultra-wide-angle lens, and a 12-megapixel TrueDepth front camera, ideal for capturing stunning photos and videos.

The iPhone 14 sports a sleek design, featuring a flat-edge aerospace-grade aluminium frame and Ceramic Shield material on the front panel, providing both durability and aesthetic appeal.

Additionally, it boasts an IP68 dust and water resistance rating, ensuring resilience against environmental elements.

Whether you're looking to upgrade your smartphone or switch to Apple for the first time, the iPhone 14 offers exceptional value for money, combining cutting-edge features with an attractive price point.

Article Title: iPhone 16 case leaked: This is what the upcoming iPhone may look like
Article Text:
iPhone 16 design change: What to expect



Apple is expected to launch its next-gen iPhone 16 series models in September. However, rumours and speculations related to the upcoming iPhones are already making the rounds on the internet. Now, a new leak suggests that the iPhone 16 may get a major design overhaul.In a post shared on the social media platform X (earlier Twitter), a tipster named Ice Universe shared a video showing the alleged case of the upcoming iPhone 16.The leaked case reveals that the upcoming iPhone 16 may have a vertical rear camera setup, similar to the one that was last seen on iPhone 12.The new case design also reveals a new cutout at the right side of the phone which may house a dedicated camera shutter button for the iPhone 16 Pro models.The dedicated shutter button which is expected to come powered by the company‚Äôs haptic engine is rumoured to join the existing physical buttons. This button may use a soft tap for focus and a double tap/hard press for capture, offering an improved camera experience.This alignment will reportedly enable spatial video recording capabilities similar to iPhone 15 Pro which has two cameras stacked vertically while the third camera is arranged diagonally.However, the latest rumours contradict earlier reports that suggested that the iPhone 16 may arrive with a buttonless design.The leaked case also suggests that Apple may be adding more buttons alongside the volume and power controls. The customisable "Action" button, which was introduced in iPhone 15 Pro, may also make a return in iPhone 16. This button also has the potential to replace the mute switch and offer users programmable functionalities. If these rumours are to be true, it would significantly alter the look and feel of the iPhone 16 lineup.
Article Summary: A new leak suggests that the iPhone 16 may get a major design overhaul. The leaked case reveals a vertical rear camera setup, similar to the one that was last seen on iPhone 12. The new case design also reveals a new cutout at the right side of the phone which may house a dedicated shutter button.

Article Title: Elon Musk told HR: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt care ‚Äî fire them,‚Äù claims lawsuit filed by former SpaceX employees alleging sexual harassment
Article Text: Eight former SpaceX engineers file sexual harassment lawsuit against SpaceX CEO Elon Musk, accusing him of creating a hostile work environment with demeaning behavior and retaliation. Lawsuit includes allegations of inappropriate conduct and crude naming of products. Complaints also filed with NLRB and reported by Bloomberg.
Article Summary: Eight former SpaceX engineers file sexual harassment lawsuit against SpaceX CEO Elon Musk. Lawsuit includes allegations of inappropriate conduct and crude naming of products. Complaints also filed with NLRB and reported by Bloomberg. The lawsuit was filed in federal court in California.
